verbs.description: [ARG0: Former CIA Director John Brennan] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that President Donald Trump 's withdrawal from the Iran Deal is a " dangerous , dangerous act " that " puts at risk our national security] . "
